mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE FROM GUESTBOARD) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUESTBOARD (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE)
